sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnemplyrinfo ( emplyr_id , orgnzt_id , user_nm , password , empl_no , ihidnum , sexdstn_code , brthdy , fxnum , house_adres , password_hint , password_cnsr , house_end_telno , area_no , detail_adres , zip , offm_telno , mbtlnum , email_adres , ofcps_nm , house_middle_telno , group_id , pstinst_code , emplyr_sttus_code , esntl_id , crtfc_dn_value , sbscrb_de ) VALUES ( #emplyrId# , #orgnztId# , #userNm# , #password# , #emplNo# , #ihidnum# , #sexdstnCode# , #brthdy# , #fxnum# , #houseAdres# , #passwordHint# , #passwordCnsr# , #houseEndTelno# , #areaNo# , #detailAdres# , #zip# , #offmTelno# , #mbtlnum# , #emailAdres# , #ofcpsNm# , #houseMiddleTelno# , #groupId# , #pstinstCode# , #emplyrSttusCode# , #esntlId# , #crtfcDnValue# , #sbscrbDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnemplyrinfo SET emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , user_nm = #userNm# , password = #password# , empl_no = #emplNo# , ihidnum = #ihidnum# , sexdstn_code = #sexdstnCode# , brthdy = #brthdy# , fxnum = #fxnum# , house_adres = #houseAdres# , password_hint = #passwordHint# , password_cnsr = #passwordCnsr# , house_end_telno = #houseEndTelno# , area_no = #areaNo# , detail_adres = #detailAdres# , zip = #zip# , offm_telno = #offmTelno# , mbtlnum = #mbtlnum# , email_adres = #emailAdres# , ofcps_nm = #ofcpsNm# , house_middle_telno = #houseMiddleTelno# , group_id = #groupId# , pstinst_code = #pstinstCode# , emplyr_sttus_code = #emplyrSttusCode# , esntl_id = #esntlId# , crtfc_dn_value = #crtfcDnValue# , sbscrb_de = #sbscrbDe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnemplyrinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND emplyr_id = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT emplyr_id , orgnzt_id , user_nm , password , empl_no , ihidnum , sexdstn_code , brthdy , fxnum , house_adres , password_hint , password_cnsr , house_end_telno , area_no , detail_adres , zip , offm_telno , mbtlnum , email_adres , ofcps_nm , house_middle_telno , group_id , pstinst_code , emplyr_sttus_code , esntl_id , crtfc_dn_value , sbscrb_de FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE emplyr_id = #emplyrId#

SELECT A.EMPLYR_ID , A.ORGNZT_ID , A.USER_NM , A.PASSWORD , A.EMPL_NO , A.IHIDNUM , A.SEXDSTN_CODE , A.BRTHDY , A.FXNUM , A.HOUSE_ADRES , A.PASSWORD_HINT , A.PASSWORD_CNSR , A.HOUSE_END_TELNO , A.AREA_NO , A.DETAIL_ADRES , A.ZIP , A.OFFM_TELNO , A.MBTLNUM , A.EMAIL_ADRES , A.OFCPS_NM , A.HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO , A.GROUP_ID , A.PSTINST_CODE , A.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE , A.ESNTL_ID , A.CRTFC_DN_VALUE , A.SBSCRB_DE FROM ( SELECT EMPLYR_ID , ORGNZT_ID , USER_NM , PASSWORD , EMPL_NO , IHIDNUM , SEXDSTN_CODE , BRTHDY , FXNUM , HOUSE_ADRES , PASSWORD_HINT , PASSWORD_CNSR , HOUSE_END_TELNO , AREA_NO , DETAIL_ADRES , ZIP , OFFM_TELNO , MBTLNUM , EMAIL_ADRES , OFCPS_NM , HOUSE_MIDDLE_TELNO , GROUP_ID , PSTINST_CODE , EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE , ESNTL_ID , CRTFC_DN_VALUE , SBSCRB_DE , ROWNUM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword#
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY EMPLYR_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE 1=1
EMPLYR_ID = #searchKeyword#
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
